title: Word-formation processes of the Indonesian slang used in Cita Cinta Magazine No: 04/XII
abstract: This study is a sociolinguistics study about Indonesian slang which undergoes the process of word formation used in the Cita Cinta teenage magazine. From this study, the writer wants to find out the Indonesian slang words in Cita Cinta teenage magazine. In addition, the writer wants to find out the type of word formation processes which used in Indonesian slang words. Finally, the writer would like to know the most frequent word formation processes of Indonesian slang words . The writer used the study of George Yule (1985) as the reference of types of word formation processes. Besides, the study of Norman C. Stageberg (1950) was used as the addition type of word formation processes. In addition, the writer used the theory of Abdul Chaer (1994) in Linguistik Umum as a reference to support the theory. In addition, the writer used the book of Debby Sahertian and Indari Mastuti to find the Indonesian slang words. The writer used qualitative approach in conducting this study. The writer found thirteen types of word formation processes that were used in Indonesian slang words in Cita Cinta teenage magazine. In contrast, Cita Cinta teenage magazine only used ten types of word formation processes. Borrowing is the most frequent type used by Indonesian slang words in Cita Cinta teenage magazine no.04/XXI.
